description.value:
The crystal diminishes the lightning bolt and silences the thunder.

Until it triggers or until the end of the encounter, you are protected by the suppression crystal. As an immediate interrupt that occurs automatically when you are first hit by a thunder or a lightning attack, you gain resist 15 thunder and resist 15 lightning until the end of your next turn. If this power is used but the resistance is not triggered before the end of the encounter, the crystal is still consumed.
